name: It's a CLAP!
description:
Clap your hands together by using the left and right stick on your controller. 

Clapping to a slide worth celebrating grants you a point per clap. Slides with contet NOT worth celebrating make you lose points.

First player to reach a 100 points wins the presentation.

Have fun!

Controllers and more than two players are required for this game.
